property.name: cardClass
property.label: Card CSS Class
property.description: CSS Classes for the wrapping card div

property.name: buttonSize
property.label: Button Size
property.description: Size of the standard header buttons (to align with custom header actions)

property.name: configName
property.label: Card Configuration
property.description: (Developer) Name of the Card Configuration record to be used (see sfpegCard__mdt).

property.name: isReadOnly
property.label: Read-Only?
property.description: Flag to set the component in read-only mode.

property.name: isCollapsible
property.label: Collapsible?
property.description: Flag to let the component expand/collapse the result list.

property.name: isCollapsed
property.label: Collapsed by default?
property.description: Flag to set the default collapsed state of the component.

property.name: actionConfigName
property.label: Header Action Configuration
property.description: (Developer) Name of the Action Configuration record to be used in header (see sfpegAction__mdt).

property.name: maxSize
property.label: Max. #Actions Displayed
property.description: Max number of actions displayed before overflow in menu.

property.name: useDML
property.label: Use DML?
property.description: Flag to force the use of without sharing DML instead of standard LDS.

property.name: isConfirmed
property.label: Confirm Pending Changes?
property.description: Flag to ask user for confirmation upon page close if changes are pending (for console mode only).

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API Name of the Card Object.

property.name: recordIdStr
property.label: Record ID
property.description: ID of the Card Record (with merge tokens)

property.name: isDebug
property.label: Debug?
property.description: Flag to show debug information.

property.name: isDebugFine
property.label: Debug (fine) ?
property.description: Flag to show debug information for all sub-components.
